description:
Specialized cleaning for technical gear. This spray-on cleaner makes it easy to wash hiking boots, backpacks and other equipment that can't go in the washing machine. It's also great for spot-washing waterproof jackets and pants that don't need the full treatment.

  • Safe for use on any footwear or technical fabrics that aren't machine washable
  • PFAS-free formula
  • Protects existing water-repellent finishes
  • Removes dirt and neutralizes odors
  • To use, brush off any loose dirt or debris. Spray on affected area, then wipe off with a wet, clean cloth. Let your gear dry naturally
  • 100% recycled container is made from post consumer plastic and ocean plastic
  • Bluesign® approved product
name: Grangers Footwear + Gear Cleaner 275ml
